title: Banking frauds triple in the past fiscal year: RBI data
description: The amount involved due to fraud in public banks was Rs. 10,507 crores, while private banks incurred losses of Rs. 3,107 crores. The number of frauds due to card and internet transactions shot up more than four times, with 29,000 cases being detected in FY24.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
